Package org.e2immu.annotation

Annotation Interface Finalizer

@Retention(CLASS) @Target(METHOD) public @interface Finalizer
Annotation on a method, always contracted, indicating that after calling this method, no other methods may be called anymore on the object. After calling a finalizer, the object has gone into a final state.

The analyser imposes strict rules for the life-cycle of objects with a finalizer method:

  1. Any field of a type with finalizers must be effectively final (marked with Final).
  2. A finalizer method can only be called on a field inside a method which is marked as a finalizer as well.
  3. A finalizer method can never be called on a parameter or any variable linked to it, with linking as in Linked.
These rules allow the analyser to enforce the final state of the object.
